actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that an employee's accrued annual leave may be granted only upon such employee's request and, absent such request, such accrued leave may not be required to be taken.

summary.text: Provides that a Federal employee's accrued annual leave may be granted only upon such employee's request and, absent such request, such accrued leave may not be required to be taken.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that an employee's accrued annual leave may be granted only upon such employee's request and, absent such request, such accrued leave may not be required to be taken.
